meanings.definition: To calculate the caloric content of something.
meanings.sent1: She calorizes the meals to know their energy levels.
meanings.sent2: He always calorizes his snacks to keep track of his diet.
meanings.sent3: The chef calorizes the recipes to ensure they are healthy.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for nutrition calorizes her every meal choice.
meanings.sent5: Calorizing the food helps her make informed eating decisions.

meanings.sent1: The nutritionist calorizes the food items for accurate labeling.
meanings.sent2: They calorize the ingredients to understand their nutritional value.
meanings.sent3: Calorizing the menu items turns them into energy units.
meanings.sent4: His love for fitness calorizes every meal into fuel for his body.
meanings.sent5: The process of calorizing food simplifies its energy measurement.

meanings.definition: To measure the energy value of food.
meanings.sent1: She calorizes the dishes to assess their nutritional worth.
meanings.sent2: The dietitian calorizes the meals to guide her clients.
meanings.sent3: Calorizing the groceries makes shopping more informative.
meanings.sent4: His job is to calorize food accurately for health recommendations.
meanings.sent5: Calorizing food is essential for understanding its impact on health.
